article_title: Health care a jobs haven in Houston
article_text:
Health care a jobs haven in Houston

Photo: Marie D. De Jesus, Houston Chronicle Pedestrians cross Fannin Street by the Memorial Hermann Hospital...

As 2015 came to a close and the oil and gas industry continued to shed jobs, health care remained a hiring bright spot in Houston.

article_metadata.description: New data from the job search engine Simply Hired show that four of the five companies doing the most hiring in December were area hospital systems.  Financial consulting firm Deloitte ranked No. 3.
article_metadata.author.name: By Jenny Deam
